screen.name: MessageBox
screen.title: Message
screen.applet: from enigma import eSize, ePoint orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize() textsize = (textsize[0] + 100, textsize[1] + 100) offset = 20 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 120 wsizex = textsize[0] + 100 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (600 > wsizex): wsizex = 600 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey) self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) listsize = (wsizex - 20, 140) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(10, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, orgpos.y()))

screen.name: MessageBoxSimple
screen.title: Message
screen.applet: from enigma import eSize, ePoint orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize() textsize = (textsize[0] + 100, textsize[1] + 100) offset = 20 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 180 wsizex = textsize[0] + 100 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (600 > wsizex): wsizex = 600 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey) self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) listsize = (wsizex - 20, 160) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(10, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, orgpos.y()))

widget.convert: {"templates": {"default": (37, [ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos = (2, 3), size = (35, 35), png=0), # key, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (50, 3), size = (120, 37), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (180, 3), size = (650, 37), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # filename, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (870, 3), size = (300, 37), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 3), # size, MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos = (1150, 3), size = (35, 35), png=4), # syncPng, ], True, "showOnDemand"), "old": (23, [ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos = (0, 0), size = (24, 35), png=0), # key, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (30, 0), size = (60, 37), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (100, 0), size = (335, 37), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # filename, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (445, 0), size = (130, 37), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # size, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (585, 0), size = (95, 37), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # sync, ], True, "showOnDemand"), }, "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 25), gFont("Regular", 22)], "itemHeight": 37 }
